hoot.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a shout or laugh that shows you think something is funny or stupid
hoot.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Hoots of laughter rose from the audience.
hoot.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a sound that an owl makes
hoot.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a short clear sound made by a vehicle or ship, as a warning
hoot.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: if a vehicle or ship hoots, it makes a loud clear noise as a warning
hoot.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The car behind was hooting at me.
hoot.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: if an owl hoots, it makes a long ‘oo’ sound
hoot.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: to laugh loudly because you think something is funny or stupid
hoot.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: He had the audience hooting with laughter.
